title: Patch Notes are in Korean
body:
Seconds ago my client performed an update, and I went to check the patch notes to see what had changed.

The notes are all in Korean:
[https://ibb.co/8MqQrRN](https://ibb.co/8MqQrRN)

Additionally, the overview section appears to be affected:
[https://ibb.co/jfKgtLT](https://ibb.co/jfKgtLT)

No other sections are unusual.

replies.body:
1. Try running a client repair.
2. Check your region settings on the login page. Obvs you're still connected to OCE, but if it tried to half dl the Korean client it might shed some light. You could also try switching your region to NA then back to OCE.
3. Failing the above, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
